medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of diffuse lower abdominal pain yesterday at 4 pm. Symptoms are gradual in timing, dull in quality, severe in severity, and have lasted for 1 day. The pain is located in the left lower quadrant and is accompanied by nausea, without vomiting or diarrhea.
